issue.title: [CF 627] Option "Allow global cooldown" is bugged
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.Warrior level 80. I am using of internal TMW timers (not OmniCC)
2. Add auras 46968,5246 (it is bugged on several other auras too) and activate timers. Uncheck "Allow global cooldown"
3. Use any other abilities

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
GCD timer on 46968,5246 will be displayed

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6/0/3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no errors


> Posted by CurseForge user nrw2000 | Imported from CurseForge issue #627 | Raw

comments.body:
The "Allow global cooldown" option only applies to OmniCC's timers. That's why it is grouped with those options.

So, I guess you are asking for the ability to ignore the GCD with DogTag timers... I will see what I can do.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It will be great. I started to use complicated DogTags scripts today and found that it is very powerfull tool.


> Posted by CurseForge user nrw2000

Added a parameter to the [Duration] tag that allows this to be configured in r641.

Use [Duration(gcd=false)] or [Duration(gcd=false):TMWFormatDuration] or any other variations you like.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
